290395.「ユーちゃんを どの髪型にしてあげるんバ？\n<break>: Which haircut are you going to give Yu?<break>

290396.「ん？ それだと 今の髪型と変わらないバ。\n<bw_break>:
Hmm? That's no different than your current
hairstyle, ba.<bw_break>

290397.「<%sM_Hair>だと \n こんなイメージに なるんバ。\n この髪型で:
<%sM_Hair> gives me this image. Can I go all
out with this haircut?<yesno><close>

290398.「やめるんバね。\n ユーちゃんの髪型を 変えたくなったら\n いつでも 来ると:
You're quitting, aren't you? If you ever
want to change your hair, you can come back
anytime!

292120.「艶もあり さっぱりした印象を受けますね。\n 手入れが 少々 大変そうですが\:
It looks shiny and refreshing. It looks a
bit of a pain to take care of, but let Bud
be responsible for that.

292122.「普段の髪型に戻すと 気持ちが落ち着きますね。\n バドの編み込みの 手際の良さ:
I feel so much better when I get back to my
normal hairstyle. I'm always amazed at the
deftness of Bud's braiding.
